member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1
member.summary: Provides the base class for the image stream.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of .

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, sets the position within the current stream.
member.param: A frame index offset relative to the origin parameter.
A value of type System.IO.SeekOrigin indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
member.returns: The new position within the current stream.
member.exception: Seek operation is not supported by the current stream.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1.Dispose
member.summary:
Closes the stream and releases all resources.
Use Dispose function rather than Close function.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1.Open
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, opens the current stream.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1.Close
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, closes the current stream and releases any resources associated with the current stream. This function is internally called by .

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1.Length
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the length in number of frames.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1.Position
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the next frame index.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1.IsLiveStream
member.summary: Gets whether the stream is live stream meaning that its length is not constant. Those streams are usually not seek-able. See also: .

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStream`1.CanSeek
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamWriter
member.summary: Image stream writer abstract class. See generic class also.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamWriter`1
member.summary: Image stream writer abstract class. It is the base class for classes providing image stream reading.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamWriter`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the image stream writer class.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamWriter`1.WriteAsync(`0)
member.summary:
Creates and starts the task responsible for frame writing. If this function is called must be handled by a user itself.
By using this function writing to some streams can be accelerated.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamWriter`1.Write(`0)
member.summary: Writes an image from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by 1 element.
member.returns: True if the operation is successfully completed, false if the writer failed to write or the has been reached.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamWriter`1.WriteInternal(`0)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class returns an image and a status. Position is advanced.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamWriter`1.WriteTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value, in milliseconds, that determines how long the writer will attempt to write before timing out.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader
member.summary: Image stream reader abstract class. See generic class also.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader`1
member.summary: Image stream writer abstract class. It is the base class for classes providing image stream reading.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the image reader class.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader`1.ReadAsync
member.summary:
Creates and starts the task responsible for frame reading. If this function is called must be handled by a user itself.
By using this function reading from some streams can be accelerated.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader`1.Read(System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Reads an image from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by 1 element.
member.param: If a null is returned this can be due to has been reached.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader`1.Read
member.summary: Reads an image from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by usually 1 element.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader`1.ReadInternal(`0@)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class returns an image and a status. Position is advanced.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader`1.GetEnumerator
member.summary:
Gets the enumerator for the stream.
If the stream does not support seek, an exception will be thrown during iteration.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader`1.System#Collections#IEnumerable#GetEnumerator
member.summary:
Gets the enumerator for the stream.
If the stream does not support seek, an exception will be thrown during iteration.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader`1.ReadTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value, in milliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to read before timing out.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReaderEnumerator`1
member.summary:
Enumerator for the image stream.
Stream must support seek operation.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReaderEnumerator`1.#ctor(Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader{`0})
member.summary: Creates new image stream iterator.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReaderEnumerator`1.MoveNext
member.summary: Moves the position of the iterator by 1.
member.returns: True if the position increment is valid, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReaderEnumerator`1.Reset
member.summary: Resets the enumerator,

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReaderEnumerator`1.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the iterator and resets the position within the stream.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReaderEnumerator`1.Current
member.summary: Gets the current image within the stream.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReaderEnumerator`1.System#Collections#IEnumerator#Current
member.summary: Gets the current image within the stream.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReaderExtensions
member.summary: Provides extensions for image stream.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReaderExtensions.ReadAs``2(Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageStreamReader{Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IImage},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Calls read function defined by the stream and converts an returned image if necessary.
If the image can not be read (null), null is returned.
member.param: Forces data copy even if a casting is enough.
If data copy is needed throws an exception.
member.returns: Converted image or null if the image can not be read.

member.summary: Internal OpenCV pointer for the capture object.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCaptureBase.Close
member.summary: Releases all resources allocated by capture.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCaptureBase.ReadInternal(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IImage@)
member.summary: Reads the next image in the stream and advances the position by one.
member.returns: True if the reading operation was successful, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCaptureBase.Length
member.summary: Gets the length in number of frames.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCaptureBase.ConvertRgb
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to force conversion of an input image to color type.

member.summary: Gets the frame size.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCaptureBase.FrameRate
member.summary: Gets the frame rate.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture
member.summary: Represents camera streamable source and provides functions and properties to access a device in a streamable way.

member.summary: Creates capture from camera.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture.Open
member.summary: Opens the camera stream.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture.Brightness
member.summary:
Gets or sets the brightness of the camera.
If the property is not supported by device 0 will be returned.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture.Contrast
member.summary:
Gets or sets the contrast of the camera.
If the property is not supported by device 0 will be returned.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture.Exposure
member.summary:
Gets or sets the exposure of the camera.
If the property is not supported by device 0 will be returned.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture.Gain
member.summary:
Gets or sets the gain of the camera.
If the property is not supported by device 0 will be returned.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture.Hue
member.summary:
Gets or sets the hue of the camera.
If the property is not supported by device 0 will be returned.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture.Saturation
member.summary:
Gets or sets the saturation of the camera.
If the property is not supported by device 0 will be returned.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture.FrameSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the frame size of the camera.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.CameraCapture.FrameRate
member.summary:
Gets or sets the frame rate of the camera.
If the property is not supported by device 0 will be returned.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.FileCapture
member.summary: Represents video file streamable source and provides functions and properties to access data in a streamable way.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.FileCapture.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates capture from video file.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.FileCapture.Open
member.summary: Opens the video file stream.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.FileCapture.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary:
Sets the position within the current stream.
Warning: the underlying OpenCV function seeks to nearest key-frame, therefore the seek operation may not be frame-accurate.
member.param: A frame index offset relative to the origin parameter.
A value of type System.IO.SeekOrigin indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
member.returns: The new position within the current stream.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.FileCapture.Position
member.summary: Gets the current position in the stream as frame offset.

member.summary: MPEG1 codec name: "PIM1".

member.summary: Motion JPEG codec name: "MJPG".

member.name: F:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec.IntelYUV
member.summary: Intel YUV codec name: "IYUV".

member.summary: User selection - on Windows dialog will be opened. Value: -1.

member.summary: Creates new video codec from an id.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec.FromName(System.Char,System.Char,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Creates new video codec id from 4-character code. For example, FromName('P','I','M','1') is MPEG-1 codec, FromName('M','J','P','G') is motion-jpeg codec etc.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec.FromName(System.String)
member.summary: Creates new video codec id from 4-character string.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec.op_Implicit(Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec)~System.Int32
member.summary: Casts video codec to an 32-bit integer.
member.returns: 32-bit integer representation of the video codec.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec.op_Explicit(System.Int32)~Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec
member.summary: Creates video codec from the 32-bit integer.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec.op_Explicit(System.String)~Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec
member.summary: Creates video codec from the 4-character string.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoCodec.ToString
member.summary: Gets the string representation of the codec name.

member.summary: Internal class for OpenCV highgui library invocation.

member.summary: Creates video writer structure.
member.param: Name of the output video file.
4-character code of codec used to compress the frames. See class.
Frame rate of the created video stream.
If true, the encoder will expect and encode color frames, otherwise it will work with grayscale frames

member.summary: Writes/appends one frame to video file.

member.summary: Finishes writing to video file and releases the structure.
member.param: pointer to video file writer structure

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageDirectoryReader
member.summary: Represents directory stream-able source and provides functions and properties to access data in a stream-able way.

member.summary: Creates an instance of .
member.param: Use natural sorting, otherwise raw image order is used.
If true searches the current directory and all subdirectories. Otherwise, only top directory is searched.
Loader image function. If null default loader is used.

member.summary: Creates an instance of .
member.param: Use natural sorting, otherwise raw image order is used.
If true searches the current directory and all subdirectories. Otherwise, only top directory is searched.
Loader image function. If null default loader is used.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageDirectoryReader.Open
member.summary: Open the current stream. This overload does not do anything.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageDirectoryReader.Close
member.summary: Closes the current stream. This overload resets position to zero.

member.name: M:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageDirectoryReader.ReadInternal(Accord.Extensions.Imaging.IImage@)
member.summary: Reads an image from the stream.
member.returns: True if the reading operation was successful, false otherwise.

member.summary: Sets the position within the current stream.

A value of type indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.

member.summary: Gets the total number of files in the specified directory which match the specified search criteria.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageDirectoryReader.Position
member.summary: Gets the current position within the stream.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageDirectoryReader.DirectoryInfo
member.summary: Gets the source directory info.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageDirectoryReader.FileInfos
member.summary: Gets the ordered set of files which compose the current image directory stream.

member.name: P:Accord.Extensions.Vision.ImageDirectoryReader.CurrentImageName
member.summary:
Gets the current image file name.
If the position of the stream is equal to the stream length null is returned.

member.name: T:Accord.Extensions.Vision.VideoWriter
member.summary: Video writer that writes images into video file.

member.summary: Creates new video writer (with default codec).
